spec_data.Name: alef-fonts
spec_data.Description:
Alef is a free multilingual font designed specifically for screens.
Alef supports English, Hebrew, and various other European languages, and it's
readable even in extremely small sizes.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:10:14 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A free multi-lingual font designed for screens
